level.heading: UNAPPROVED CONTINUING EDUCATION PROGRAMS AND ACTIVITIES (ยง 17-7709)

level.text: Continuing education credit shall not be granted for the following:
Organizational activity such as serving on committees or councils or as an officer in a professional organization;
Meetings or activities such as in-service programs which are required as part of one’s job; and
Continuing education activity completed before the two (2) year period for which the continuing education credit is submitted.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 7845 (September 29, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 8247 (August 24, 2007).
